title: Which is the best song for a girl to dance to on stage? - Quora

response.answer_text: On Stage 'Whine Up' by Kat Deluna is the best song for a girl to dance. Kat DeLuna herself provided the rap, rapping at a lower register. This song earned DeLuna a Billboard Latin Music award for “Latin Dance Club Play Track Of The Year."This song suitable for all girls to dance.
